item.title: By: Carol Dempsey
item.dc:creator: Carol Dempsey
item.description: I have know Nell for so many years and she was such a dear! She helped me out when I was young and I truly appreciated everything she did for me. I can remember babysitting for Jenny and would make cookies which Nell loved. Still couldn't believe she wore size 4 shoes!! What a wonderful lady and I will always remember her!God blessed you with a long beautiful life,now you are in His hands!! Love Carol Dempsey
item.content:encoded: I have know Nell for so many years and she was such a dear! She helped me out when I was young and I truly appreciated everything she did for me. I can remember babysitting for Jenny and would make cookies which Nell loved. Still couldn’t believe she wore size 4 shoes!! What a wonderful lady and I will always remember her!God blessed you with a long beautiful life,now you are in His hands!! Love Carol Dempsey
